thread.title: GoPro camera survives two-year space odyssey and returns to earth with incredible shots of the Grand Canyon
thread.title_full: GoPro camera survives two-year space odyssey and returns to earth with incredible shots of the Grand Canyon

author: Jasper Hamill
title: GoPro camera survives two-year space odyssey and returns to earth with incredible shots of the Grand Canyon
text:
Video loading 
This video shows the astonishing footage shot by a GoPro camera which was thought to have been lost during a journey to space. 
Five friends launched it in June 2013, hoping to send it to the very edge of Earth's atmosphere and back again. 
But the camera disappeared during the long plummet back to earth when the team lost contact with a mobile phone which was attached to it. 
Now, two years later, a hiker has found the phone and camera intact. 
He took it into an AT&T store to trace its owner, which has resulted in the world getting to see its amazing footage. 
Bryan Chan, who led the mission, told ABC News : "We're blown away by how many people love the video. 
"I've got message from people saying they've put it on their desktop, and it's just really great to have such an overwhelming positive response."
